scripts.preinstall: composer --version || { echo 'Please first run npm install -g composer-cli'; exit 1;}
scripts.composerPrepare: npm install -g composer-cli && npm install -g generator-hyperledger-composer && npm install -g composer-rest-server && npm install -g yo && npm install -g composer-playground
scripts.hyperledgerStart: docker kill $(docker ps -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker rmi $(docker images dev-* -q) && mkdir ~/fabric-tools && cd ~/fabric-tools && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hyperledger/composer-tools/master/packages/fabric-dev-servers/fabric-dev-servers.zip && unzip fabric-dev-servers.zip && cd ~/fabric-tools && ./downloadFabric.sh && ./startFabric.sh && ./createComposerProfile.sh
scripts.deployNetwork: mkdir dist && composer archive create -a dist/lyra-cli.bna --sourceType dir --sourceName . && composer network deploy -a dist/lyra-cli.bna -p hlfv1 -i PeerAdmin -s randomString -A admin -S
scripts.pingNetwork: composer network ping -n lyra-cli -p hlfv1 -i admin -s adminpw
